website_summaries.verdict: This mascara has a lot of nice benefits, especially if you like to curl your lashes. However, its tendency to dry out quickly could make it a pricey investment if you use it frequently.
pros: Produces full volume while adding a bit of lift to lashes
Ideal for using with an eyelash curler, as it has a soft, lightweight feel that doesn't weigh down lashes
cons: Has the tendency to dry out fairly quickly, especially when used daily

customer_reviews.title: Get the Volume mascara instead!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Kevyn Aucoin mascara for about two years now, but in the past have always used the volume mascara. I have stick straight lashes and spend a bit of time curling them every morning, so thought I'd try something to help the results stick. Unfortunately this product is not the answer. It undid all of the hard work I spent curling my lashes every morning, an issue I've never had with the volume mascara from Kevyn Aucoin. I don't know how this could be marketed as a curling mascara. It is terrible and I will never buy this again. I'm going back to the volume mascara that holds my curl as is.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: Check for Authenticity.
customer_reviews.text: This was not Kevyn Aucoin mascara. This product ran down my face and smeared. I have been using the curling mascara for over 10 years and have NEVER HAD THIS HAPPEN. I highly doubt this is geniune Kevyn Aucoin product. This is the one time I have ordered from this vendor and this is the one time I have received a horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Makeup Maven

customer_reviews.title: This curling mascara is a great way to make your eye lashes look long and ...
customer_reviews.text: This curling mascara is a great way to make your eye lashes look long and beautiful. The technique for taking it off takes some getting used to. You're supposed to wet your fingers with warm water and gently "pull" the mascara off the lash. I noticed my eye lashes don't come out as much as they do when I take off other types of mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee W

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it can be a little thick coming out of the tube, but both the mascara and the wand are top notch. I love how it lifts, separates and curls (without a lash curler!) my normally short, straight, thin lashes and makes it look like I'm wearing a subtle sized pair of false lashes! Truly amazing. It is not waterproof, but it lasts all day under normal circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. I've tried other but seriously this stuff is the best. It's not dime store price but in order to get the results it brings I'm paying the same price for a lesser product.
customer_reviews.author: Tayln

customer_reviews.title: This mascara lasts but is amazingly easy to remove.
customer_reviews.text: The best mascara because it’s a wonderful every day mascara that doesn’t even need to be wiped off. It stays put all day but is very easy to remove at the end of the day. It literally can come off by just splashing water vigorously on your face. No rubbing is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: The best part about this mascara is that it doesn't require ...
customer_reviews.text: The best part about this mascara is that it doesn't require eye makeup remover to get it off. It comes off just washing your face and doesn't smear to cause "raccoon eyes". It comes off almost like a face peel that you have rubbed off. The wand is thin and allows you to apply very precisely.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Tropoli

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Finally a Mascara that doesn't straighten my eye lashes. If you curl your eye lashes this mascara is for you. My lashes didn't droop within an hour, stayed lifted, opened my eyes up and stayed on the way I applied it. No clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Fake Mascara by Magnifique Square
customer_reviews.text: Total fake do not order from Magnifique Square, it wasn’t sealed, wrong box, wrong colored packaging. DO NOT USE!! Real mascara is the bottom tube in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Alan R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Kevyn Aucoin's is a tubing mascara, which means it forms tubes around the lashes. It does not run or flake at all. It washes off in the small tubes it forms, so it may appear your eyelashes are falling out, but fear not! It is only the mascara. This is the best mascara I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara! It has never smudged under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lise

customer_reviews.title: Love that this comes off in tubes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Goes on easy, doesn’t clump much and comes right off with a bit of warm water.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Dried up!
customer_reviews.text: I have always appreciated the luxury of Kevin Aucoin products. This tube was a dried up sad excuse for mascara. I fully believe it was old product.
customer_reviews.author: smalltowncritic

customer_reviews.title: The order I received in the mail was disastrous and I will no longer order the product or recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks of using this product, I developed an allergic reaction to this mascara and my eye lid is still recovering. I have been using this for at least the last year with this product purchased from a store. The order I received in the mail was disastrous and I will no longer order the product or recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great mascara. I have extremely sensitive eyes and I can tolerate it for a good part of day. I've tried many mascara with bad results (eyes tear and get very red after just a few hours). Will continue using this product as long as I have the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara you will ever use
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. I've been using this for 2 years now and I swear by it. Stays put all day, no panda eyes and comes off with hot water. I swear my lashes grow while using it too.
customer_reviews.author: Gpow

customer_reviews.title: The best mascara!!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite mascara ever!! No smudging- comes off with water and leaves no residue. Makes my lashes long and full. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: product is fantastic. but I just purchased and it was completely ...
customer_reviews.text: product is fantastic. but I just purchased and it was completely dried out. unusable. Unfortunately, I was traveling and ended up throwing it away so i cannot send it back. Am going to buy again from a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results, great for my sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best mascara I've ever used. Separates the lashes and makes them noticeably longer and thicker. I have sensitive eyes and this formula does not bother me. It actually stays on all day and comes off with water as advertised, don't know how they do it, mascara magic.
customer_reviews.author: redhawk

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like it...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product, I really did. I gave it several tries even. But it clumped, didn't curl my lashes, and honestly made them look so much worse than not wearing mascara at all. So sad!
customer_reviews.author: Zhara

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Really gross. Will toss. Leaves my lashes looking worse than without mascara and taking off the mascara makes me think my eyelashes are going to pull out any moment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mascara. I am a flight attendant and have eye makeup on for several hours a day. This does not smudge. So it doesn't seem to irritate my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: 1111gailb

customer_reviews.title: Life changing mascara. It really curls as you apply ...
customer_reviews.text: Life changing mascara. It really curls as you apply it. Very weird when you wash it off - comes off in little spider leg thingies. But hey - it's life changing mascara!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Machamer

customer_reviews.title: Needs new packaging
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mascara itself, best have have used. It absolutely doesn't smudge or sweat off under the eyes. The packaging is not good though. When you pull the want out of the tube it is covered in a big gloppy mess where the bristles begin. Over time, you lose a lot of product due to this. I think it runs out faster because of this as well. For this price, it should last more than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: It's a little dry.... It is ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little dry....It is unable but I know it has a different texture when I buy it at the cosmetic counter.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great maskara but it dries out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I Love this maskara but with this price you would expect to last longer. It does dry out very quickly and I feel like I am buying a new one very often so I wish I could find a good maskara that doesn’t dry out in a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: really like it while it works
customer_reviews.text: Dries out quickly. But, really like it while it works, so will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: J Powell

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't smear but...
customer_reviews.text: Immediately after application, I loved this product. I have tiny, barely-there lashes, and it nicely enhanced my eyes. However, as the day wore on, it did something odd to my lashes: they started not so much to curl, but to stick straight up. It looked a little odd. Further, although there was no beneath-the-eye smudging, black detritus started to shed. I don't know whether my lashes were falling out, or whether the product was flaking in lash-shaped bits. Either way, it was alarming. I won't say I won't ever use it again, but it's not my fave. Still searching for the perfect smudge-free mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Didn't curl my lashes. I get better results with Maybelline. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't flake or run down your cheeks as the day goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara! To remove you only need water, it slides right off. Very gentle to your lashes and it gives great volume.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... eyebrow technician introduced me to this mascara and I love it. Her shop sometimes runs out of this ...
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrow technician introduced me to this mascara and I love it. Her shop sometimes runs out of this mascara because it's so popular, so having Amazon as a buying option is great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: There is no mascara out there better than this one! It makes your lashes long and beautiful, never clumps and stays put all day. Removes very easy with makeup remover because of the tubes that are formed around the lashes.
customer_reviews.author: R. Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked forever to find a mascara that doesn't leave raccoon eyes...found it! Even when you cry....My loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Kazee

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara, just wish it lasted longer for the price point. But love that I don't need to use makeup remover it stays on until I want to wash it off. And, like look after its applied.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L. Ranallo

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I've tried a lot of mascara; regular & waterproof, but none have ever held the curl for the entire day until this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: It's not that great.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to wash off. Leaves film. It's not that great.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: You have to try! You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: It's my favorite! Love no black raccoon eyes when I rub my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was awful. I was not able to use ...
customer_reviews.text: It was awful. I was not able to use it at all. It was dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Stout

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara ever used
customer_reviews.text: Love how it never smudges and comes off in tubes. Definitely worth the extra money. Makes lashes look very long.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: save your $$$$
customer_reviews.text: HONESTLY, this is just regular mascara. absolutely nothing special about this. Its also water proof, and really hard to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - I won't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This product made my eyes water a bit, and it was kind of hard to apply without getting some on my skin (although maybe that's just my clumsiness). However, there are two major reasons why I'm giving this two stars: 1) I bought this because it advertised that it would curl my eyelashes; I saw no evidence of this, whatsoever, which was extremely disappointing, and 2) the whole idea of 'pulling the product off with warm water' - while in theory this sounds great, and it did come off easily, I still ended up pulling out some of my eyelashes, so that was a little counter-productive.
customer_reviews.author: KCTwinsMom

customer_reviews.title: You just found the BEST mascara!
customer_reviews.text: So, I am the person who notoriously has raccoon eyes whenever I wear mascara. You have seen me with big grey marks under my eyes... For years and years I have been looking for a mascara that DOES NOT do that to me, and this is the only Brand I have found that does just that. It is Perfection. I can wear it all day with no problems at all, AND it is super easy to come off! BUY IT! you will not regret it for one second.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Dantini

customer_reviews.title: Get the volumizing one instead
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the volumizing version of this same mascara for years and love it, but wanted to try something new. This curling one gets all over my eyelids, the brush is much more goopy and harder to control. Would definitely recommend the volumizing version of the same mascara instead.
customer_reviews.author: G Pal

customer_reviews.title: Kevyn Aucoin mascaras are my favorite and the only one I have faith in
customer_reviews.text: Kevyn Aucoin mascaras are my favorite and the only one I have faith in! I've tried this one and the volume one and I don't know which one I like better. They're almost the same. I've tried all kinds of mascaras and this Japanese tube technology is the ONLY kind that does not give me raccoon eyes! I don't understand why even the waterproof kinds smudge on me. So anyway there are a few different brands of these tube-type mascaras, but this brand is my favorite. Unfortunately I can't really get it anywhere in a regular store, so I always have to order it online. I hope these never get discontinued!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! Have ordered it twice from Amazon, too (no problems). I have used multiple upper end mascaras in the past, but this one far outperforms anything I have ever used.....I will be sticking with it permanently. I finally don't need to use an eyelash curler. And, it also simply DOESNT come off....during the day, in the water....no smudges under my eyes any more💕
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth Wimberly

customer_reviews.title: I have used Kevyn Aucoin products before and have been ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Kevyn Aucoin products before and have been impressed with them. This mascara does not curl, even after using lash curler. Maybe the product consistency is too heavy - my lashes are pointing downward after the mascara dries.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara
customer_reviews.text: As mascaras go, this is a decent mascara, but it clumps, so have a dry mascara wand handy to brush them. It does not flake, either.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: The best mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best mascara. Whenever I use it, I am asked if I have lashes on. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! Had never heard of this brand before ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! Had never heard of this brand before Kim K did her beauty routine(I know...I know...) but this stuff is pretty awesome. Stays on well and doesn't clump at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: totally satisfied....love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara!!!! This is my 2nd tube, no smudges, stays in all day....the way it comes off is a little freaky in the beginning but the way this product wears far out weighs any other. I had problems with smears and smudges from every mascara I wore until this one!! Love love love!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Tube mascara is great -- this one is the best.....doesn't flake, easy to apply and I have not experienced any irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Wyogirl

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite mascara. It doesn't not smudge
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. It doesn't not smudge, and comes off very easily with warm water. I prefer it to the same brand's volume mascara but own both and sometimes use both at the same time -- curling first then volume.
customer_reviews.author: STP

customer_reviews.title: essential
customer_reviews.text: My fair complexion and oily skin are a problem. Mascara smudges easily and when it does, I look so like a raccoon. This Kevyn Aucoin curling mascara is the ONLY product that I have ever had success with and I have really tried a large number of products over the years. This is the one that works. I would love to have a more natural looking mascara but the ones that are more natural, smudge the most. If its a choice between dark smudges under my eyes and mascara that stays put, the answer is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Alice C.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST MASCARA EVER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mascara. All mascaras run on me, even waterproof ones, and then it drives me crazy that it's impossible to get off. I don't have time for make-up remover, I just want to wash my face and be done with it. This mascara doesn't run, and is super easy to get off. And it makes my lashes look so long and pretty. I seriously haven't used any other mascara since I discovered this about 10 years ago!! No more raccoon eyes, for real.
customer_reviews.author: M. Teegarden-downs

customer_reviews.title: Does not curl
customer_reviews.text: This is used to be a great product. I would curl my lashes and then put this on, and it would hold the curl all day. The last two tubes I bought do not work as well. I'm not sure if the formula was changed, but this is no longer effective. I had to change my review from 5 stars to two.
customer_reviews.author: ND shopper

customer_reviews.title: great mascara
customer_reviews.text: this is the best mascara i have ever used I started using it 3 yrs ago I have long lashes so i use the thicking one y wont be sorry stays on all day and nite great find out get some
customer_reviews.author: janice bivins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lashes
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this mascara. It goes on smooth, creates full, curly lashes and washes off so easy at night. I was skeptical reading reviews before purchase, but I am a believer now.
customer_reviews.author: Mumba1956

customer_reviews.title: Trish’s twin
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. It wears identical to Trish McEvoy Lash Curling mascara for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lsm0415

customer_reviews.title: Good non-smudging mascura
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great mascura - it doesn't smudge under the eye, which I always have a problem with using other mascuras. I was considering using it for my wedding makeup, but it is NOT waterproof and when water touches it, it comes off in "little pieces/strings". But, great for every day use. I wear a mask and glasses at work, and by the end of the day, I still don't have any smudges underneath my eyes, so I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: beutigirl

customer_reviews.title: It Shadows On Me
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this mascara but, as most mascaras do, it left shadows under my eyes after only about an hour or so. I also didn't notice that it applied any better than any mascara, cheap or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Volunteer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite All Time Mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mascara I use for many years. It stays on all day without smudging one bit. It washes off easily with soap and water and leaves no residue.
customer_reviews.author: EllenB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara bc it doesn't leave black gunk all over my eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Does not work any better than the pink tube of my favorite drug store brand. Extremely over rated and over priced. I returned immediately. What was I thinking?
customer_reviews.author: donnacdavis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It has some pros and cons. It does not get clumpy which I like. However, because it goes on sparingly - it takes longer to put on. Not much curling occurs which is the biggest downside.
customer_reviews.author: ABOnline

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Nothing curls my eyelashes quite like this mascara. I receive compliments constantly when I use it. Worth every penny! Once you try this product, you won't want to wear any other mascara again!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: it all depends
customer_reviews.text: Its a good mascara and its best feature is that it DOES NOT flake. But it only comes in the extreme black color, you get a smaller tube than most mascaras and it tends to glob after just a few uses. Plus it costs $25. So if you want a mascara that will not flake and are willing to pay $25 for black only, it's for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Norton

customer_reviews.title: Not good for short eyelashes that really need to be curled
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this so bad, but I was just disapointed. It does not curl my eyelashes enough :(
customer_reviews.author: Maricela M. Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this mascara for 5 years and love it. It is the only one that doesn't smudge black under my eyes:). It's water proof. Yet removes easily. My eyes and skin are very sensitive an it causes no irritation or reaction. I wear contacts sometimes and there are no complications with contacts either. It's well worth the cost and I'm thrilled to have found it on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: bethany lark

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy
customer_reviews.text: It's fine when you only put one layer on but after that it gets really clumpy... I like at least two layers.
customer_reviews.author: Candice D. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but super small amount in tube
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I work hard, I play hard, and I like looking good doing both. This definitely holds up and gives great length along with curl with absolutely no smudging, ever. It seems to flake when its running out and has become a little dry in the tube which seems to happen pretty frequently due to the fact that it only has 0.5 Grams of product in it (so it feels like I'm constantly buying this stuff). Anyway, definitely is what it says it is and until I find another similar product that either has more in it or is cheaper.. I'll stick to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Roe

customer_reviews.title: Dried up mascara
customer_reviews.text: Mascara came completely dried up, couldn't even return it because I tossed the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Capo

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many popular brands...from drugstore to high end department stores...this is the one I have been searching for...I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Sharee Jo Lane

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best mascara there is!!! I love it and will not use any other! It washes off so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Kevyn was the best!
customer_reviews.text: His mascara goes on so smoothly and comes off extremely easy with just water. I bought the black because I can't find the red anymore. I guess they quit making it after his death? The red was wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Ladyblue

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara Ever
customer_reviews.text: My doughtier and I have used this for years and love the product. The mascara does"t run and does a wonderful job of enhancing our lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

product_meta.title: Kevyn Aucoin The Curling Mascara, Black, 0.18 Ounce (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description:
Kevyn Aucoin believes beauty is always in fashion; trends come and go, but true beauty transcends time. Using the highest quality ingredients, innovative new formulas, and exciting seasonal twists on timeless staples, Kevyn Aucoin is a must-have for the modern woman.

THE CURLING MASCARA

The Curling Mascara adds length and volume to your lashes for an everyday glam look. Don’t miss a lash with this clump and flake-free formula. The skinny, unique brush makes application a breeze when you apply this smudge proof mascara.

HOW TO USE IT

Take your lashes to a level of curl. This smudge proof and long wearing mascara stays on all day, and comes off easily. Follow these easy steps for an everyday look.

1. Apply to lashes until you reach desired volume and curl

2. To remove, simply wash away with wash and a gentle cleanser or makeup remover

Pro Tip: For professional application, use a tissue to blot mascara brush.

ENHANCE YOUR INNER BEAUTY

Beauty has a lot to do with character. Working with many iconic figures, from Cher to Cindy Crawford, Kevyn Aucoin's prestigious beauty line and products are designed to enhance what you already have as you let your inner beauty shine.

EVERYONE WOMAN IS BEAUTIFUL

Makeup can be the first step in learning things about yourself you may never have discovered otherwise. True beauty is more than skin deep, it is through the transformative power of makeup that we can discover something deeper about our true selves.
feature_bullets: A mascara that tightly conforms to the lash, gently forming delicately curled lashes
A protein-based formula that beautifully separates and defines every last lash
Kevyn Aucoin The Curling Mascara, Black, 0.18 Ounce (Pack of 1)
